subject: Sales
title: Grit Beats Talent in Sales
description: One-minute skill: Grit Beats Talent in Sales.

hook.text: A gifted salesperson coasts through year one. By year three, the grinder has passed them.

buildup.text: Angela Duckworth's research found that persistence predicts success better than natural talent.

discovery.text: In sales the pattern is clear. Top earners aren't the smoothest talkers. They're the most consistent.

twist.text: Talent without discipline fades. Grit without skill leads to busy failure. You need both.

climax.text: The sweet spot is learned skill plus stubborn consistency. That combination is nearly unstoppable.

punchline.text: Talent gets you noticed. Grit gets you paid.

quiz.question: According to Angela Duckworth, what predicts success better than talent?
